title: Not Your Crush’s Cauldron
author: April Asher
description: Olive Maxwell, a supernatural teacher, steps out of her comfort zone by moving in with her longtime crush, Baxter, who is a Guardian Angel. This friends-to-lovers, forbidden romance explores their evolving relationship as they navigate magical and personal challenges.

title: Heartless Hunter
author: Kristen Ciccarelli
description: In a post-revolution world where witches are hunted, Rune hides her identity while rescuing her kind. She courts Gideon Sharpe, a witch hunter, to gain intel, leading to an intense enemies-to-lovers dynamic.

title: A Fate Inked in Blood
author: Danielle L. Jensen
description: Freya, bound in an unwanted marriage, reveals her magical shield maiden powers and enters a forbidden romance with Bjorn, the son of the jarl who betrayed her. This Norse-inspired fantasy romance is filled with action and passion.

title: Just for the Summer
author: Abby Jimenez
description: Justin and Emma, both cursed to make their partners find true love with someone else, decide to date each other to break the curse. This heartwarming romance explores their journey of finding love and breaking free from their pasts.

title: Every Breath After
author: Jessie Walker
description: This MM rockstar romance follows Mason and Jeremy's tumultuous relationship, filled with angst and emotional depth, making it a standout in the Lost Boys series.

title: Wild Love
author: Elsie Silver
description: This new series starts with the World’s Hottest Billionaire discovering he has a twelve-year-old child and navigating a complicated relationship with his best friend's younger sister.

title: The Reappearance of Rachel Price
author: Holly Jackson
description: Bel's mother, Rachel, returns after being missing for sixteen years, prompting Bel to uncover the truth behind her mother's disappearance.

title: How to Solve Your Own Murder
author: Kristen Perrin
description: Annie must solve her great-aunt Frances' murder, foretold by a fortune teller decades earlier, while avoiding a similar fate.

title: Listen for the Lie
author: Amy Tintera
description: Years after being accused of her best friend's murder, Lucy must confront her past when a true-crime podcast reopens the case.

title: House of Glass
author: Sarah Pekkanen
description: Attorney Stella Hudson navigates the twisted secrets of the wealthy Barclay family while investigating the suspicious death of their nanny.

title: Middletide
author: Sarah Crouch
description: Elijah returns to his hometown to find himself entangled in a murder investigation that mirrors the plot of his unfinished novel.

title: Look in the Mirror
author: Catherine Steadman
description: Nina inherits a mysterious luxury home in the British Virgin Islands, where she uncovers unsettling truths about her family's past.

title: Starting Strength: Basic Barbell Training
author: Mark Rippetoe
description: This book provides a comprehensive guide to barbell training, focusing on the fundamental lifts and the biomechanics behind them.

title: Own the Day, Own Your Life
author: Aubrey Marcus
description: Marcus provides practical advice on optimizing various aspects of daily life, including fitness, diet, and productivity.

title: You Are Your Own Gym
author: Mark Lauren
description: A guide to using bodyweight exercises to get in shape, written by a Special Ops trainer.

title: The Fitness Mindset
author: Brian Keane
description: This book focuses on the mental and physical aspects of fitness, helping readers set realistic goals and maintain long-term health.

title: SIFT: The Elements of Great Baking
author: Nicola Lamb
description: Comprehensive baking guide with over 100 sweet and savoury recipes.

title: Sobremesa
author: Susana Villasuso
description: Authentic, easy Mexican recipes for midweek dinners to weekend feasts.

title: Simply Jamie
author: Jamie Oliver
description: 130 easy, fresh recipes for busy home cooks.

title: EASY
author: Roxy Pope & Ben Pook
description: 100 fuss-free vegan recipes from the So Vegan duo.

title: Fitwaffle’s No-Bake Baking
author: Eloise Head
description: 100 no-bake recipes for indulgent homemade treats.

title: The Ramayana
author: Valmiki
description: A classic tale of Prince Rama's quest to rescue his wife Sita from the demon king Ravana. Ramayana is one of the greatest epics of Hindu Religion. The popularity of the book is so great that it has run into forty two impressions ever since it was originally published in the year 1951

title: The Odyssey
author: Homer
description: The story of Odysseus's adventurous journey home after the Trojan War.

title: The Mahabharata
author: Ved Vyas
description: An epic story of the Kurukshetra War and the fates of the Kaurava and the Pandava princes. The Mahabharata, brings to you the great epic in a brief form with wonderful illustrations on each page depicting important events from the epic. This short version not only teaches you the many lessons of life, but also about the Bhagavad Gita, the holiest Hindu scripture and divine song of Lord Krishna, an incarnation of Lord Vishnu and the central character of the epic.

title: D’Aulaires’ Book of Greek Myths
author: Ingri d’Aulaire
description: A beautifully illustrated collection of Greek myths for all ages.Here are the gods, goddesses, and legendary figures of ancient Greece--mighty Zeus, with his fistful of thunderbolts; gray-eyed Athena, goddess of wisdom; Helios, the sun; greedy King Midas--lavishly depicted by Caldecott winners Ingri and Edgar Parin d'Aulaire.

title: The Mabinogion
author: Anonymous
description: The Mabinogion is a collection of 11 prose stories collated from medieval Welsh manuscripts. The tales draw on pre-Christian Celtic mythology, international folktale motifs and early medieval historical traditions.

title: The Prose Edda
author: Snorri Sturluson
description: The Prose Edda is the most renowned of all works of Scandinavian literature and our most extensive source for Norse mythology. Written in Iceland a century after the close of the Viking Age, it tells ancient stories of the Norse creation epic and recounts the battles that follow as gods, giants, dwarves and elves struggle for survival.
